Purpose: To quantify 3-methylglutaconic acid, 3-methylglutaric acid, and related metabolites for the diagnosis and management of 3-methylglutaconic aciduria and other metabolic disorders.
Container: Urine collection container; Lithium heparin or EDTA tube for plasma
Equipment: Gas Chromatography-Mass Spectrometry (GC-MS) or Liquid Chromatography-Mass Spectrometry (LC-MS) system
